name: home-assistant-mcp
description: Complete Home Assistant integration with historical data analysis and real-time control
long_description: This extension provides comprehensive Home Assistant integration for Claude Desktop, enabling both historical data analysis and real-time device control. Features include entity history and statistics, real-time state monitoring and control, automation management, system information access, guided conversation prompts for common tasks, and advanced entity search and management capabilities.

ha_url.title: Home Assistant URL
ha_url.description: The URL of your Home Assistant instance (e.g., https://homeassistant.local:8123 or http://192.168.1.100:8123)

ha_token.title: Home Assistant Long-Lived Access Token
ha_token.description: Your Home Assistant long-lived access token. Create one in Settings > Profile > Security.

request_timeout.title: Request Timeout (seconds)
request_timeout.description: Timeout for API requests to Home Assistant (default: 30)

tools.name: get_entity_history
tools.description: Get historical data for a specific Home Assistant entity

tools.name: get_entity_statistics
tools.description: Get long-term statistics for a Home Assistant entity

tools.name: get_available_entities

tools.name: get_logbook_entries
